Label.en: Many funny stories exist about how exactly the treasure was discovered
Label.fr: Many funny stories exist about how exactly the treasure was discovered
Label.es: Many funny stories exist about how exactly the treasure was discovered

Label.en: Including one insisting that a cow fell down a hole in the ground and unearthed the stash!
Label.fr: Including one insisting that a cow fell down a hole in the ground and unearthed the stash!
Label.es: Including one insisting that a cow fell down a hole in the ground and unearthed the stash!

Label.en: Another story says they were found in the ruins of the House of The Old Black Women, an abandoned nunnery.
Label.fr: Another story says they were found in the ruins of the House of The Old Black Women, an abandoned nunnery.
Label.es: Another story says they were found in the ruins of the House of The Old Black Women, an abandoned nunnery.
